statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE ar_experience = 'beginner';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE ar_experience = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY age ASC, username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND ar_experience = 'Advanced' ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%Smith%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT ar_id, ar_experience_name FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY ar_experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN ar_experiences ON users.user_id = ar_experiences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ar_id) AS num_ar_experiences FROM ar_experiences GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences WHERE ar_experience_name LIKE '%Game%';
SELECT user_id, ar_experience_name FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY ar_experience_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN ar_experiences ON users.user_id = ar_experiences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM experiences ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT ar_model, ar_texture FROM ar_data WHERE ar_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT experience_name, description FROM experiences WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experience_name;
SELECT ar_model, ar_texture FROM ar_data WHERE ar_size > 100 ORDER BY ar_size DESC;

SELECT u.username, e.experience_name, a.ar_size FROM users u JOIN experiences e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN ar_data a ON e.experience_id = a.experience_id WHERE u.age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC, e.experience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, experience_name, ar_model_url FROM ar_experiences WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_category='Technology' AND show_notifications=TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT experience_name, ar_model_url FROM ar_experiences WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_category = 'Adventure' AND show_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profile ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT country, city, street_address FROM user_location WHERE country='USA';
SELECT user_id, experience_name, date_created FROM ar_experiences ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT u.username, up.first_name, up.last_name FROM users u JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id
SELECT u.username, ul.country, ul.city, ul.street_address FROM users u JOIN user_location ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id
SELECT u.username, up.bio, up.first_name FROM users u JOIN user_profile up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE u.age > 30
SELECT * FROM ar_experiences ae JOIN user_preferences up ON ae.user_id = up.user_id
